hero.content: IT professional with experience spanning Power Platform development, web technologies, and automation solutions. I specialize in building smart, user-friendly applications with Power Apps, Power Automate, Third-Party APIs, and AI models to simplify workflows and improve efficiency. Passionate about solving complex problems, optimizing processes, and creating digital tools that make everyday work easier and more meaningful.

Beyond low-code development, I also have professional experience in web development using Next.js, as well as scripting in C# and Java. This combination of skills allows me to bridge traditional and modern development practices, delivering solutions that are both powerful and practical.

certifications.title: Fundamental Course of Microsoft Power Platform
